headline: Northern Trust Selected by Aristotle for Middle Office Outsourcing Mandate
summary: CHICAGO, August 07, 2025--Northern Trust has been appointed to provide middle office outsourcing services for institutional portfolios managed by Aristotle's equity affiliates.
